meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lee Raskin Erin Sheffield Steve Berman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1183.

td.p: Lee Raskin, a high school teacher from San Diego, California
Erin Sheffield, a yoga instructor from Ventura County, California
Steve Berman, a film executive from Santa Monica, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,201)

tr.td: QUOTES
FAMOUS COUPLES
TRANSPORTATION
BOXING MOVIES
MEDICINE
LEFTOVERS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'During the filming of "Citizen Kane", it was said of him, "There but for the grace of God goes God"')

tr.td: During the filming of "Citizen Kane", it was said of him, "There but for the grace of God goes God"

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
